title: Brother Printers font
content:
Hey i am struggling to identify this font.  
It looks almost exactly similar to Horatio, except the ’e’ in Horatio is rounded instead of angular open counter, much like Avant Garde in that respect.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 16.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907162040/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%2016.jpg) | 25.32 KB |

 [‹ Coldplay Album](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907162040/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46306 "Go to previous forum topic") [David Nieper: Can someone please ID the typeface(s) used in this logo? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907162040/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46285 "Go to next forum topic")
author: crystalpulse

comments.content:
Not perfect match but ITC Ronda is close

[http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/elsner\_flake/itc\_ronda/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907162040/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/elsner_flake/itc_ronda/ "http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/elsner\_flake/itc\_ronda/")

Hope this helps  
Mr Pink
